body.name: VEGER Portable Charger for iPhone Built in Cables and Wall Plug, 10000mah Slim Fast Charging USB C Power Bank, Travel Essential Battery Pack Compatible with iPhone, iPad, Samsung More Devices(White)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 22 hrs 58 mins
features: 【Portable Charger with Built in Cables】: VEGER 10000mAh portable phone charger built in 3 types cables, Mirco USB, USB C and other type cables, the AC Wall plug built in allows you to recharge itself directly from the wall outlet, do not need to carry adapter and cables everywhere any more.

【Portable Charger for Multiple Devices】: This Portable phone charger is designed with 4 outputs: 2 Cables outputs charging and additional USB C and USB A outputs. It supports 4 devices charging max simultaneously. The bidirectional Type-C ports works as input and output. Each of the cables and USB ports output supports 15W max fast charging.

【Slim Size but Powerful Capacity】: The slim portable charger has a compact only 5.9 x 2.7 x 0.72 inch size, 8oz weight, just like a phone case to put comfortably in your palm or packet, which is portable and convenient to carrying out for business trip or vocations. 10000mAh battery full capacity makes your devices full of power.

【Universal Widely Compatibility】: VEGER portable battery charger is widely compatible with All iPhone, iPad, Samsung, Google Pixel, tablets, just connected to your device and the external battery would fix with different devices to get fast charging.

【What You will Get】: A VEGER 10000mAh portable charger with built in cables, 1x user manual, our worry-free 12 month guarantee and 7 Day/24H friendly customer service. If you have any problems, please contact us and we will solve it within 12 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Built-in Multiple Cables and Ports Built-in 3 kinds of cables and a USB A port, a USB C port, you can charge 4 devices simultaneously max. Pass-through Charging When recharging the external battery itself through the foldable AC wall plug, the portable phone charger works well for charging mobile devices at the same time. Strong Compatibility The USB C portable charger is strongly compatible with most 5V devices such as iPhones, Android Phones, Tablets, and small current devices like earphones, speakers.

Aircraft Traveling Available Designed for business trips or airplane traveling, the VEGER 38.5W portable charger is available to carry on the plane, powering up your trip without messy charging adapters or cables. Comprehensive Protections An Intelligent chip built-in provides power short circuit protection, over current protection, over-voltage, and over heat protection to ensure safe charging. Right way to remove cables attention please!!! The cables built-in will be easier to pull out through the horizontal direction. In the case which usually put in and pulled out through distorted direction, the cables will be damaged irreversibly.

Technical Specifications Brand VEGER Capacity 10000mAh / 38.5Wh Advantage Wall Plug & Cables Outputs USB A, USB C, Cables, 15W max Inputs 110-220V Wall Plug or USB C 5V-3A Recharging Time 5-6 hours Dimension 5.95'' x 2.76'' x 0.72'' Weight 8 oz

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great charger for android or iPhone.
reviews.reviewText: I've bought 4 of these so far, for myself, my Boyfriend, his friend & for my dad as a gift. It works that well & is super convenient, thin, easy & fast charging. I like that it's easy to check the charge with 1 button push (button on top) to display a digital percentage number, the cords are attached & have holding indents, instead of being loose, & it's really light weight. I love the purple, they love the basic black, all arrived quickly (great for friend's upcoming trip). The different charging options are also nice. It was also priced well. Great overall charger for multiple items.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Charge
reviews.reviewText: This battery pack plugs into the wall and eliminates the need to carry an extra cable. So easy to charge anywhere there is an outlet. This is my second purchase. Bought my first one for my youngest daughter from e Christmas and it worked great. My oldest wanted the wanted device because it was so easy to use. The different cables attached charge almost anything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The best portable charger I’ve found at an affordable price. I LOVE that it has the prongs to plug it directly into the wall which means one less chord for me to lose. The multiple charging cables that tuck into the sides is so convenient AND I can’t lose those chords either. Brilliant design and holds a decent charge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can’t live without
reviews.reviewText: This has been the best charger I have ever bought. It isn’t the credit card lightest version but not too heavy either. It fits perfectly in my purse and has saved me from a complete dead phone on several occasions. I’ve gotten two- three complete phone charges from one the 100% of the charger, so it’s been great to travel with when your out and about all day taking pics and video and don’t have access to a wall recharge for your phone. The fact that’s it’San all in one with no cords to loose images it invaluable. I’ve bought two already and will buy more as gifts!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A travel must have
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for a trip to Greece. I like the connected cables making it easy to use on multiple devices. I does take a long to charge the unit but it will hold the charge for a long time. Would recommend to others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super handy for travel or just on the go.
reviews.reviewText: Bought 2 of these and then re-orded another 1 as a gift because it works so well and is a great value. Easy to toss in a backpack and be able to charge anything on the go without needing a ton of cords. The battery life display is very helpful as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love using this product, especially for travel or emergencies. The battery life is excellent and I can go days without recharging it. The slim shape of the product makes it easy to pack or even put it in my pocket if I'm short on time. My favorite thing about the product is the multiple charger plugs to choose from. I no longer have to worry about bringing the correct cord with me. The only thing about this product that I think can be improved is finding a way to make the charge cords longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Disappointing short lived functionality
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted to love this as much as I loved the previous model that has since been recalled. I love the multiple connections and the ability to plug the portable charger in wall w/o carrying any additional cords. Unfortunately, it only worked a couple of times before it stopped. The charger itself charges when plugged in indicates that it is on full power, but when plugged into my phone, it will light up… then randomly light off and stop charging. this is with my phone sitting on a table and no connection disruptions. Bummer.

reviews.reviewTitle: Worked as a battery backup for my security camera and charged my Surface Go
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this power bank to use it in an application different from most people. I wasn’t looking for a battery to charge my devices. Instead, I was looking for a way to keep my security cameras powered in case of a power failure. To do this, I needed a power bank that plugged into the wall to remain charged while simultaneously being able to deliver power to my camera. Many power banks cannot simultaneously be charged while outputting power to other devices.General Review:- Has a battery percentage display to know how much power remains- Can be charged while simultaneously charging other devices- Can be charged by plugging it into a wall outlet or through USB C (cable and plug not included). The built-in wall outlet is for North American outlets. However, the specifications indicate the input is 100-240VAC, 50/60 Hz which means it can be charged anywhere in the world without getting damaged if you have an adapter to convert the plug. This means this would work well for travel.- Comes with a travel pouch- When plugged into a standard 2-plug outlet, it does not block the use of the second outlet- Includes a 4” long built-in USB C & Micro USB cable and a 4” long built in Lightning cable to charge most devices. These built-in cables are only useful if you remove the battery from the outlet and do not intend to use the device while it charges as they are too short.- The built in USB C, Micro USB, and Lightning cables can output 5V @ 2.4A. I tested and confirmed that this charges a standard Android phone and an iPad. This however is insufficient to charge a larger tablet such as a Microsoft Surface Go. In fact, most power banks are not capable of charging devices like the Surface Go.- In addition to the built-in cables, it has output ports to connect a USB-A or USB-C cable to charge your devices. These output 5V at 3A. I tested the USB-C output and found it was able to charge a Microsoft Surface Go. I charged a Surface Go 2 from 71% to 100% when the battery was disconnected from power. This in turn dropped the Veger battery from 100% to 71%.- In terms of electrical safety certification, it displays marks for CE (conformity for use in Europe), FCC (electromagnetic radiation conformity in the USA), and PSE (electrical and EMI safety in Japan). However, it is important to note that CE, FCC, and PSE follow a self-declaration procedure which allows a manufacturer to claim that it meets requirements without the need to be tested by an independent test laboratory such as CSA, UL, TUV, or ETL (which would provide more assurance in terms of safety as you are not relying on the manufacturer to be telling the truth).Performance as a Battery Backup for a security Camera:For my test, I connected a Wyze Cam V3 camera to the USB-A port of the Veger battery. With the battery plugged into my 120V wall outlet, I waited until the battery was at 100% and then disconnected it from power and observed the battery level drop over time. I found the following:- When I disconnected the battery, the camera reset. It took 1.5 minutes for the camera to record again. This means the power output of the battery drops momentarily when disconnected from power. This device would be better if it could maintain the output power when disconnected.- When reconnecting the battery, it caused a short 2 second disturbance in the recording (missed footage) but did not reset the camera.- After 12 hours disconnected with only the Wyze Cam V3 connected, battery power was at 59%. After 24 hours it was at 17%.- Based on the data retrieved, I determined that with the Wyze Cam connected, power drops linearly according to the formula:Battery Power % = 100.36 – 3.4575 x Time (h)Where Battery Power is in percentage and Time is in hours. For example, to determine the battery power after 4 hours, it would be 100.36 – 3.4575 x 4 = 86.53%.- Using this equation, if you solve for Time and a battery power of 0%, I can determine that the battery will last approximately 29 hours before the camera shuts off. That is a pretty good backup time.Summary:Overall, this product works as a battery backup for my security camera and as a charger for my devices. It would be better if the power output did not drop temporarily when disconnected in order to keep my camera powered continuously, but it wasn’t designed for this purpose so I can’t complain.As a device charger, one big plus is it was capable of charging my Microsoft Surface Go products. Most power banks are not capable of doing this. It’s not a fast charger, but it worked. The built-in power cords are short, but helpful in a pinch if you forget to bring your longer cables. Overall, I am happy with my purchase.

EDIT AGAIN.. seller quickly responded that they will replace it. Impressed by their service!!________________________________________________I really loved this when I first got it in August however it just stopped working. Only used this a few times only when we're going on a trip so it hasn't even been that much. It just didn't charge one day. Hoping to hear back from the seller. i knew this came with warranty but not sure.--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------I have nothing but great things to say about this power bank! Very Lightweight but oh so durable!! It lasted a full day (imagine Disneyland where you use your phone so much) for 3 people to charge and was still left with at least about 20%. It is pricier than others but I think this purchase is so worth it! I also like that it came with a little pouch for storage (unfortunately I lost it 😞) and I like that I can charge it directly to the outlet. Don't think twice! Buy this!!!
Great because it has the wires embedded into the charger already so you don’t have to go scrambling for more. Charges my phone super quick— would 100% recommend!

reviews.reviewTitle: It doesn't fast/quick charge via the included cables
reviews.reviewText: Fairly slim powerbank. Display tells you rough capacity. Included charging cables work; integrated wall outlet makes it much more convenient to charge on the go.It's possible to charge a device (use as a "pass through") with the included cables, while the battery is plugged into an outlet. That was a nice surprise.Fast charging is only available via a separate cable plugged into the USB-C port. USB-A, and the included cables, will not quick/fast charge your device.

reviews.reviewTitle: A great package for all needs.
reviews.reviewText: The built in plug works great and is a nice addition to any portable charger. The attached cables make it compact and easy to carry with out worrying if you forgot a cable. It is a bit bigger then expected but I'm still happy with the size and usability.
